tags.description: Groen river Camp Site is just south of the Groen river estuary. The campsites are close to a rocky shore, with sandy beaches just south of the lighthouse, and north at Groen River Mouth.
tags.name: Groenrivier Camp

tags.description:
1km from Groen river gate.
- 7 sites, 3 Enviro loos, no ablutions.
- A 4x4 is not required to reach this camp from Groen river gate.
General: This camp sits on a rocky shore and has a beautiful small beach just to the north of the camp. The beaches northw
tags.name: Delwers Camp
